page.landing.subtitle: Your local i18n manager
page.landing.herotext: Manage your language variables on a easy way.
page.landing.list.title: Your projects
page.landing.list.info: Projects include your language variables. Edit, delete, or create them as you wish.

modal.project.add.languages.title: manage languages
modal.project.add.languages.info: Put the required languages together and then select one to be your main language. It serves as the technical basis for all language variables.

page.import.title: file import
page.import.description: File import allows you to import files that have already been created into your project. You can use this, for example, if you want to import an existing project or if data has been lost.
page.import.upload.description: Easily upload your files by dragging and dropping them here, or click the box to select them.
page.export.title: file export
page.export.description:
With the file export feature, you have the ability to bundle your language variables into files. You can manually download them here.
Simply select one or all languages and choose the appropriate format.
You can also trigger the export via the API. For more information, follow the documentation.
